# Lucky Verma - AI/ML Engineer

> Personal website of Lucky Verma, Senior Machine Learning Engineer

## About
Lucky Verma is a Senior ML Engineer with 5+ years of experience building production AI systems, agentic platforms, and document intelligence solutions. MS in Computer Science from University of Maryland, Baltimore County (UMBC).

## Contact
- Email: luckie.verma30@gmail.com
- Website: https://luckyverma.com
- GitHub: https://github.com/lucky-verma
- LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/in/lucky-verma

## Expertise
- Agentic AI Systems (LangChain, tool use, multi-step reasoning)
- Document Intelligence (LayoutLM, OCR, information extraction)
- RAG Systems (retrieval-augmented generation, vector databases)
- Production ML (PyTorch, FastAPI, MLOps, AWS)

## Notable Projects
- Document Classification using LayoutLM (35 GitHub stars)
- US Driver License Data Extraction (24 GitHub stars)
- Sleep-Awake Classification using PPG (17 GitHub stars)
- ABP Estimation using PPG (10 GitHub stars)

## Tech Stack
Python, PyTorch, LangChain, FastAPI, RAG, Transformers, OpenAI, AWS, Docker, MLOps, PostgreSQL, Redis

## Current Role
Senior ML Engineer at Eccalon LLC
